name: Wouter Groeneveld
text: Same thing here. I also reverted to block-by-default unless it’s in the allowed list. Perhaps it would be a good idea to share our domain block list somehow just like the Pi-Hole rules? Things like https://github.com/justdomains/blocklists exist that I could integrate with my Webmention server but I can’t find any domain in those lists that I blocked (also no matches on https://www.spam.org/) so not sure if it’s worth the effort…
